description:
Monsters aren’t the only adversaries waiting to challenge Fran, but defeating slimy nobles at their own game will take a specialized approach — and a certain new skill.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kishidan Fuku Danchou wa Ya na Yatsu Deshita
Le lieutenant des chevaliers est un sale type
The Horrible Lieutenant of the Knights Brigade
騎士団副団長はヤな奴でした
